name: react-relay-network-modern-ssr
description: Server side rendering middleware for react-relay-network-modern
author: Pavel Chertorogov @nodkz

scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-mjs && npm run build-node8
scripts.build-lib: rimraf lib && BABEL_ENV=lib babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d lib && BABEL_ENV=lib_server babel src/server.js -d lib && COPY_TO_FOLDER=lib npm run build-flow
scripts.build-mjs: rimraf mjs && BABEL_ENV=mjs babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d mjs && yarn build-mjs-rename && COPY_TO_FOLDER=mjs npm run build-flow
scripts.build-node8: rimraf node8 && BABEL_ENV=node8 babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d node8 && COPY_TO_FOLDER=node8 npm run build-flow
scripts.build-flow: echo `$1` && find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo ./${COPY_TO_FOLDER:-lib}$filepath | sed 's/.\/src\//\//g'`.flow; done && find $COPY_TO_FOLDER -name '*.flow' | while read filepath; do sed -i "s/react-relay-network-modern\/lib/react-relay-network-modern\/$COPY_TO_FOLDER/g" $filepath; done
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run flow
